# <span class="badge builder"></span> StreamingQueryBuilder

## Constructor

```typescript
new StreamingQueryBuilder()
```

Builds the object.

```typescript
build()
```

```typescript

```

```typescript
noise(noise: number)
```

### <span class="badge object-method"></span> speed


```typescript
spread(spread: number)
```

Possible enum values:

 - `"fetch"` 

 - `"logs"` 

 - `"signal"` 

 - `"traces"` 

